text: Elvin Berridge (born 11 February 1989) is a cricketer from Saint Kitts. He made his first-class debut for the Leeward Islands in the 2016–17 Regional Four Day Competition on 21 April 2017. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Kittitian cricketers Category:Leeward Islands cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Elvin Berridge
